text: Hagi Jerusalemi kumapi vahe'mo'za hu'za, tagra ana ha' vahe'mokizmi zamagenkea ko antahi nonankita, menina tahirahiku nehunkeno zaferinati omne amne nehie. Ana nehigeta menina tasu zampi mani'neta antahintahi hakare nehuta, mofavre antenaku nehia a'mo ata hoza e'neriankna huta tusi tatazampi nemanune.
